content: because baby bootees needn t be a major feat of engineering… **knit flat and seamed along the sole and the back ** i find these a quick knit - perfect for when i just don t feel like working in the round and they ve proved popular with mums and babies alike **to fit foot sizes ** 0-3 3-6 6-9 months on average or a foot length heel to toe of 8 9 10 cm or about 3⅛ 3½ 4 **you will need ** 3 25 mm us 3 straight knitting needles or size needed to obtain required gauge/gauge 2 x 3mm us 2 1/2 double pointed needles or 1 size down from those used to knit the bootees 1 x 50g ball of baruffa pura lana dk 115 m /126 yds *for the bootees & ties that is about 32g 40g 48g - 75 95 110 m or 82 104 120 yds* 4 ring markers 1 embroidery/darning needle note i find a row counter very useful and a safety pin might be handy too
